experiences.title: Software Developer
description: Primarily responsible for the MyVodacomApp, a React Native application that is used by over 4 million users.
Work on fixing bugs, implementing new features and journeys.
I have very minor experience with the backend, which is written in NodeJS, but my expertise lies in React Native.
We also work on some webapps, some of which are written in ReactJS, and other React Native for web.
Tools used include: Figma, React Native, React JS, BitBucket, AWS, TeamCity, Confluence, Jira, and more.

experiences.title: Software Developer Intern
description: Intern on a team working to port over an app written in C# to ReactJS.
This specific project I worked on was an internal tool used in Vodacom Shops.
Tools used include: Figma, ReactJS, BitBucket, Confluence, Jira.
This was a four month internship. I was contracted there by BBD. The internship was cooridinated by WeThinkCode as part of my studies.

education.title: University of London
description: Currently studying a BSc in Computer Science.
The course is between 3 - 6 years long, at a pace chosen by the student.
I expect to finish the course in September 2024.
I'm doing it to fill in the gaps in my knowledge, and to learn more about the field.

education.title: WeThinkCode_
description: An intensive and accelerated 24 month software engineering course.
The course is divided into 4 semesters, each semester lasting 6 months.
The course also includes a two 4 month internship, which I completed at BBD/Vodacom.
The course is a mainly practical course, with a focus on learning by doing.
Languages learned include: C, C++, Java, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, SQL, Bash, PHP

education.title: Maharsha Boys High School
description: Subjects studied include: Mathematics, Life Orientation, Life Science, English, Afrikaans, Business Studies and Information Technology.
